thread.title: Terri
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Terri

author: Terri
title: Terri
text: I appreciate the fact that I can sell at the same prices as other leading stores such as Hobby Lobby and Wal-Mart. This is truly fair trading. The puzzles are of great quality and the representatives are very patient and helpful. They were very helpful when one of my customers had a piece missing from her puzzle by replacing it. I recommend them to any retail owner.
